description: This is a test module for PDF reader classes, containing test cases for PDF reading functionalities including reading from files and URLs, both synchronously and asynchronously, as well as handling invalid inputs and empty PDFs.

methods.name: sample_pdf_path
methods.description: Fixture that provides a path to a sample PDF, downloading it if necessary.

methods.name: sample_pdf_url
methods.description: Fixture that provides the URL to the sample PDF.

methods.name: test_pdf_reader_read_file
methods.description: Test case for reading a PDF file synchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_reader_async_read_file
methods.description: Test case for reading a PDF file asynchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_reader_with_chunking
methods.description: Test case for reading a PDF with chunking enabled.

methods.name: test_pdf_url_reader
methods.description: Test case for reading a PDF from URL synchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_url_reader_async
methods.description: Test case for reading a PDF from URL asynchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_image_reader
methods.description: Test case for reading PDF as images synchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_image_reader_async
methods.description: Test case for reading PDF as images asynchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_url_image_reader
methods.description: Test case for reading PDF images from URL synchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_url_image_reader_async
methods.description: Test case for reading PDF images from URL asynchronously.

methods.name: test_pdf_reader_invalid_file
methods.description: Test case for handling invalid file input.

methods.name: test_pdf_url_reader_invalid_url
methods.description: Test case for handling invalid URL input.

methods.name: test_async_pdf_processing
methods.description: Test case for concurrent asynchronous reading of the same PDF file.

methods.name: test_pdf_reader_empty_pdf
methods.description: Test case for reading an empty PDF file.
